## SessionStore.set() method

Set a value with a key

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
set(key: string, value: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string | Key for value to be set |
|  value | any | Value to be set on the store |
